options.blogdescription: Eine Webseite rund um Fische und Aquarien

steps.code:
<?php
// Erstelle benutzerdefinierte Navigation
$menu_id = wp_create_nav_menu('Hauptmenü');
if (!is_wp_error($menu_id)) {
    // Füge Menüpunkte hinzu
    wp_update_nav_menu_item($menu_id, 0, array(
        'menu-item-title' => 'Startseite',
        'menu-item-url' => home_url('/'),
        'menu-item-status' => 'publish'
    ));
    
    wp_update_nav_menu_item($menu_id, 0, array(
        'menu-item-title' => 'Süßwasserfische',
        'menu-item-url' => home_url('/category/suesswasserfische/'),
        'menu-item-status' => 'publish'
    ));
    
    wp_update_nav_menu_item($menu_id, 0, array(
        'menu-item-title' => 'Salzwasserfische',
        'menu-item-url' => home_url('/category/salzwasserfische/'),
        'menu-item-status' => 'publish'
    ));
    
    wp_update_nav_menu_item($menu_id, 0, array(
        'menu-item-title' => 'Aquarien-Tipps',
        'menu-item-url' => home_url('/category/aquarien-tipps/'),
        'menu-item-status' => 'publish'
    ));
    
    // Weise das Menü der primären Position zu
    $locations = get_theme_mod('nav_menu_locations');
    $locations['primary'] = $menu_id;
    set_theme_mod('nav_menu_locations', $locations);
}

// Aktualisiere Theme-Customizer Einstellungen für Twenty Twenty-Five
set_theme_mod('custom_logo', 0);
set_theme_mod('site_icon', 0);
set_theme_mod('background_color', 'ffffff');
set_theme_mod('header_textcolor', '333333');

// Setze Theme-spezifische Optionen
set_theme_mod('twentytwentyfive_color_scheme', 'default');
set_theme_mod('twentytwentyfive_font_family', 'default');

echo 'WordPress Fische-Demo erfolgreich eingerichtet!';
